then i get up you know this senior in college who has a research panel and at that time should back up and say

you know we really created this great network and we had done research and found of the 500 people we surveyed that
99 of them had illegally downloaded music within the last 30 days and so obviously we were presenting two very
very different uh sets of data and so uh i kind of was disheartened i was cut

um marketing is an interesting area when you talk about that right it's the
